div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.h3: Per the Governor's Executive Order, all face to face classes are canceled for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year.

div.p: A HUGE thank you to Tina Klosowski for donating this sign for our graduates, and to our Senior parent group for making it happen. It looks great on the soccer fence along Kiesel Road. Congrats to our seniors! #bobcatnation

Happy Administrative Professionals Day! Thank you to all our administrative professionals who go above and beyond everyday of the year in service of our students, families, and staff. You are amazing and so critical to our success. #thankful
A great opportunity for our families during these tough times. Click on the link to apply: https://www.lunchapp.com/
Please consider ordering takeout on Takeout Tuesday to support our local restaurants.

p.a: Event: Last Day of School (Half Day)

div.p: Congratulations to John Glenn High School social studies teacher, Jennifer Veitengruber, for being named Saginaw Valley Teacher of the Year.
